title: Flexport | SDE-2 | 55 Base | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech( CSE ) from Tier-1
Years of Experience: 4
Company: Flexport
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Bangalore (2 days in office rest remote)
Prev Comp: 40L Base + 4 Bonus + (RSU)
Base Salary: 55,00,000
Relocation: None
Signing Bonus: 5 LPA
RSU: 14800 (148000$ Pre IPO paper money)
Vesting Period: 4 years
Bonus: 10% every year
Total comp 1st year (Base + Bonus + Stock): 65L + RSUsw
Benefits: Nothing special


I studied hard for months as I knew I was going to get laid off. I literally did nothing other than working during the office time then doing leetcode and system design on whatever time I got left with including weekends. Then I actually got laid off and immediately started interviewing. I made to few onsites but got no offer other than this one so I accepted it. This entire year has been stressful for me, I feel the competition is high in the market right now for decent base salary. Anyways, remain motivated and keep working hard! 



Please upvote if this helps you :)
